snippet.title: Metal Dogs Official Gameplay Trailer 2021
snippet.description: Set in a world after the destruction of humankind, the harsh battle of the combat dog "Pochi" begins. Explore dungeons that change every time you enter, get a wide variety of weapons, and power up your dog! Hunt the evil "WANTED"! Enjoy exhilarating battles casually in this roguelite action game.
